maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Human...
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Humain...

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Thank you again for bringing peace to our village.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Merci encore pour avoir amené paix dans village.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Human \v[lore.title.seeker]...
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] Humain...

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Hi!\. Meet!\. Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Salut !\. Rencontrer !\. Lea !

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Human want bring human machine into village?
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Humain veut apporter machines humaines dans village ?

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], we thankful for your help and peace with human is big boon for shad.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], nous remercier pour aide et paix avec humain être bénédiction pour shad.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: However,\. human machines full of dirt and hunger for fuel.\. This can not become part of shad life.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Mais,\. machines humaines plein de poussière et affamé par essence.\. Ça pas pouvoir devenir partie de vie des shads.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Unless using them in clean way can be found I will no give my blessing.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Sauf si pouvoir utiliser eux de manière propre, moi pas apporter accord.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] best take walk through shad village and talk with people if still desire to find way to unify machine with our ways.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], ferait mieux marcher dans village shad et parler avec gens si lui toujours vouloir trouver moyen d'unifier machines avec nos traditions.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Lea.\. Meet.\. Bye.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Lea\. Rencontrer.\. Bye.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Human machines full of dirt and hunger for fuel.\. This can not become part of shad life.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Machines humaines plein de poussière et affamé par essence.\. Ça pas pouvoir devenir partie de vie des shads.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Unless using them in clean way can be found I will not give my blessing.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Sauf si pouvoir utiliser eux de manière propre, moi pas apporter accord.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] best take walk through shad village and talk with people if still desire to find way to unify machine with our ways.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], ferait mieux marcher dans village shad et parler avec gens si lui toujours vouloir trouver moyen d'unifier machines avec traditions.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Human machines bring prosperity and coolness to shad village.\. And they working with clean power.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Machines humaine apporter prospérité et fraicheur à village shad.\. Et eux fonctionner avec électricité propre.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], this is worldly blessing in harmony with the track and shad tradtiionss.\. You have our thanks.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], ça être béni au monde en harmonie avec tracé et traditions shads.\. Vous avoir remerciements.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Hello Seeker! It's good to see you.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker] ! C'est bon de vous voir.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: No more Wiccats have infested the village.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Il n'y a plus aucun \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black] dans le village.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: And the Shad have calmed down.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Et les Shads se sont calmés.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Hello Seeker! It's good to see you.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker] ! C'est bon de vous voir.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Thanks so much for finding the source of this vile infestation!
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Merci beaucoup pour avoir trouvé la source de cette épouvantable infestation !

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Is that the source of wicked kittens?!
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: C'est ça la source des bêtes mignonnes ?!

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Indeed! Summoning evil black cats on poor villagers! This can't stand!!
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Effectivement ! Faire apparaitre des chats noirs diabolique sur des pauvres villageois ! Cela ne peut continuer !!

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Looks like those were the last of them.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: On dirait que c'était les derniers d'entre eux.

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Justice has been served!
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Justice a été rendue !

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Just what were those things?
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Mais c'était quoi ces trucs ?

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Indeed! Were they really an extension of the power plant? Very mysterious!
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Effectivement ! Était-ce vraiment une extension de la centrale électrique ? C'est très mystérieux !

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: Let's return to that K'tara girl for now.
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: Pour l'instant, retournons voir cette fille K'tara !

maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/interior/chiefs-hou.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: The good Seeker, what can I do for you?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ah, le bon \v[lore.title.seeker]. Qu'est-ce que je peux faire pour vous ?
... Salut ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Ah yes, the power plant.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ah oui, la centrale électrique.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: It was built pretty much at the same time we built the city.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Elle a été construite à peu près en même temps que la ville.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: We made sure not to interfere with the track at all.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Nous nous sommes assurés qu'elle ne vienne pas interférer avec le tracé.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: To put it simply: The plant only absorbs energy that is naturally emitted by the temple.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Pour faire simple : la centrale ne fait qu'absorber l'énergie qui est naturellement émise par le temple.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Simple and clean energy. Quite brilliant if I do say so myself.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: De l'énergie facile et propre. C'est assez brillant, quand j'y repense.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Make yourself comfortable, Seeker. This may take a while.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Mettez-vous à l'aise, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Ça va prendre un moment.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: So...\.\.\. We know that the power plant isn't causing this problem, you know why?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Donc...\.\.\. On sait que ce n'est pas la centrale qui pose problème. Vous voulez savoir pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: ...Why?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Because the jungle was already "infested" when we started building the plant.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Parce que la jungle était déjà "infestée" lorsqu'on a commencé à construire la centrale.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: The Shad here seem to forget about that. But I understand their frustration.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Les Shads ici semblent avoir oublié cela. Mais je peux comprendre leur frustration.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Also these cats...\.\.\. \c[3]They attack on sight\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Sinon, ces chatons...\.\.\. \c[3]Ils attaquent à vue\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Normally sub-types of the same family follow the same patterns.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Normalement, les sous-espèces d'une même famille ont les mêmes comportements.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Meaning they SHOULD behave like Shokats. But they don't.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ce qui veut dire qu'ils DOIVENT se comporter comme des \v[combat.name.jungle/shockcat]s. Or ils ne le font pas.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: This got me thinking: \c[3]Where have I seen this before?\c[0]
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ce qui me fait penser : \c[3]Où est-ce que j'ai déjà vu ça auparavant ?\c[0]

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Well, the \c[3]Bergen Mine\c[0] of course!
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Oui, dans la \c[3]Mine de Bergen\c[0] bien sûr !

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: The track itself spawned these little bugs that took over our machinery and integrated it into its temple.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Le Tracé lui-même a fait apparaitre ces petits insectes qui ont pris d'assaut nos machines et les a intégrés à son temple.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: So... Maybe the same thing is happening here!
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Et peut-être qu'il se passe la même chose ici !

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: \c[3]Something\c[0] is controlling those cats and making them so hostile.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: \c[3]Quelque chose\c[0] contrôle ces chats et les rends si hostiles.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: I studied those bugs for quite a while, you know. Fascinating technology.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: J'ai étudié ces insectes pendant un moment, vous savez. Une technologie fascinante.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: They used a special frequency and impulses to override systems.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ils utilisent une fréquence et des impulsions spéciales pour surcharger les systèmes.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Obviously I extracted both the frequency and the semi-magnetic impulse rate.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Bien entendu, j'ai extrait à la fois la fréquence et le taux d'impulsion semi-magnétique.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Where is it?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Où est-il ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Ah, there you are!
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ah, le voilà !

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: And done! That was easier than I expected.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Et hop ! C'était plus facile que ce que j'espérais.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Everything's ready! Let's head outside for the field experiment!
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Tout est prêt ! Allons dehors pour l'expérience sur le terrain !

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Please come back and report your findings once you do, okay?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Revenez me voir quand vous aurez trouvé quelque chose, OK ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Well hello, Seeker. You have been gone quite a while.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ah, bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Ça fait longtemps que vous êtes parti.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Excuse my overprotective Bodyguard.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Excusez mon garde du corps hyper méfiant.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Somehow the Mayor thinks it's necessary... As if I needed it.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Mais le maire pense que c'est nécessaire... Comme si j'en avais besoin.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: So, what did you find?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Donc, qu'est-ce que vous avez trouvé ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Sorry...
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Désolée...

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: What? You found a strange black sloth north of the Infested Marshes?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Quoi ? Vous avez trouvé un étrange paresseux noir au nord des Marécages Infestés ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: It was doing something to a part of the track?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Il faisait quelque chose sur une partie du tracé ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: A pole appeared and repaired part of the temple?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Un pôle est apparu et a réparé une partie du temple ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Very interesting...
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Très intéressant...

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Could it be that these poles were triggered as a certain counter-measure?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Est-ce que ce serait possible que ces pôles aient réagi comme une sorte de réaction d'autodéfense ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: I analyzed the data I got from the poles you fought here.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: J'ai analysé les données que j'ai obtenues à partir des pôles que vous avez combattus ici.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: These poles act very much like a form of debugging process.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ces pôles agissent un peu comme un processus de débogage.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Each pole checking a certain sub-function or routine.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Chaque pôle vérifie une certaine sous-fonction ou une routine.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: When it can't find a "problem" it extends the search by creating more poles.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Et quand il n'arrive pas à trouver un "problème", il étend ses recherches en créant d'autres pôles.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Something must have gone wrong and the track's "Debugger" identified the Shad and us as the cause.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Quelque chose a dû mal se passer et le "Débogueur" du tracé a identifié les Shads et nous comme étant la cause.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Which isn't too far fetched, judging from our experience with the mine...
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Ce qui, tout bien considéré, n'est pas si tiré par les cheveux que cela, vu notre expérience avec la mine...
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.note: hergeholt: éloigné de la réalité, abacadabrant, tiré par les cheveux

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Ironic that the actual cause was right in front of them.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: C'est ironique que la véritable raison soit juste sous notre nez.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Well, anyway. Since no more poles are spawning I think we can assume we "calmed" the track.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Bon, en tout cas. Vu qu'il n'apparait plus d'autres pôles, nous pouvons supposer que nous avons "calmé" le tracé.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Still, I will make my way there now to make sure my assumptions are correct.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Mais je vais quand même me mettre en route pour vérifier que mes suppositions sont correctes.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Even though I'm pretty sure I'm right.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Même si je suis assez sûre d'avoir raison.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Probably take Vince along to "protect" me from the evil track.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Je vais probablement prendre Vince avec moi, pour me "protéger" du méchant tracé.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Thank you, Seeker. I will talk to K'tara on my way there.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Je vous remercie, \v[lore.title.seeker]. J'irais parler à K'tara en cours de route.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Hopefully the Shad will see reason.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Espérons que les Shads reviennent à la raison.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: You can now finally access the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] for real!
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Le chemin vers le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] est finalement libre !

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: Hold it!
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Halte !

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: What business do you have with Dr. Cretia?
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Que voulez-vous au Docteur Cretia ?
... Salut ?

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: I see. Please wait here for a moment.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: Je vois. Attendez ici un instant.

maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.orig: You're cleared.
maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.json/entities.text: C'est bon, vous pouvez y aller.
